title: A tale in a tub, or, A tub lecture as it was delivered by my-heele Mendsoale and inspired Brownist and a most upright translator : in a meeting house neere Bedlam the one and twentieth of December, last 1641 / vvritten by J. T.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
notes: J. T. is John Taylor.  cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
